title: Add graph option to Mate version
description: Develop and implement a feature for the Mate version applet that displays only one graph, occupies the full applet space, with values drawn in the background. Track value changes over the last 128 command outputs. Store these values along with timestamps.

title: Add graph option to Mate version
description: Develop and implement a feature for the Mate version applet that displays only one graph, occupies the full applet space, with values drawn in the background. Track value changes over the last 128 command outputs. Store these values along with timestamps.

title: Implement Graphing Logic
description: Write a script to generate the graph using matplotlib.

title: Display the Graph
description: Integrate the graph display logic into the applet background.

title: Real-time Graph Updates
description: Ensure the graph updates dynamically with each new command output.

title: Create Timestamped Data File
description: Create a file to store command outputs with timestamps.
